ecode.style.fontSize = '17.5px'; // 13px
fp = 'file:///Users/rainerg/ajr/Aspirin/node_modules/cson/docs/index.html';

Object.keys(fs)
Object.keys(windowManager.windows)

source = editor.getValue();
hash = md5(source)

remote.app.db.insert({name:'selfsave',md5:hash,source:source})

tpl = jade.compile(`
style
  :stylus
    body
      background: none
      opacity: .7
    .wxyp
      position: absolute
      background: rgba(30,233,99,1)
      color: black
      background: #473
.dd
  - each w in windows
    - cb = w.object.getBounds()
    .wxyp.file(style="top:#{cb.y-20}px; left:#{cb.x}px; width:#{cb.width}px; height:20px;")
       span.icon.icon-cd
       span.icon.text #{w.name}
.aa asasd
`);



txt = tpl(windowManager)
setContent(txt)

q = !(typeof q == 'boolean') || !q

inf = function(w){
  var b = w.object.getBounds()
  return `<sup>x${b.x}</sup><sub>y${b.x}</sub>W${b.width}H${b.height}`  
}

wn = 0
tpl = jade.compile(`
style
  :stylus
    body
      background: none
      opacity: .7
    .wxyp
      position: absolute
      background: rgba(30,233,99,1)
      color: black
      background: #473
.dd
  - each w in windows
    - wn++
    .wxyp.file(style="top:#{wn*32}px; left:#{0}px;")
      span.icon.icon-cd.icon-text #{w.name}
      span.icon.icon-text
        .info !{inf(w)}
.aa asasd
`);

      color: black
      background: #473

    .dblrow    
      background: #607D8B
      sdisplay: table-cell
      & sub, & sup
        sfloat: left
.dd
  - each w in windows
    - b = w.object.getBounds()
    - wn++
    .wxyp.file(style="top:#{wn*62}px; left:#{0}px;")
      span.icon.icon-cd.icon-text #{w.name}
      span.rwline.pull-right
        .dblrow
          sup X#{b.x}
          sub Y#{b.y}
        .dblrow
          sup W#{b.width}
          sub H#{b.height}
//.aa spirin

inf = function(w){
  var b = w.object.getBounds()
  return `<sup>x${b.x}</sup><sub>y${b.y}</sub>W${b.width}H${b.height}`  
}
//rgba(30,233,99,1)
tpl = jade.compile(`
style
  :stylus
    body
      background: none
      opacity: .3
    .wxyp
      position: absolute
      background: none
      color: yellowgreen
      border-top: 1px dashed yellowgreen
      border-left: 1px dashed yellowgreen
      border-right: 1px dashed yellowgreen
      padding-left: 5px
      background: none
.dd
  - each w in windows
    - cb = w.object.getBounds()
    .wxyp.file(style="top:#{cb.y-20}px; left:#{cb.x}px; width:#{cb.width}px; height:#{}px;")
       span.icon.icon-cd 
       span.icon.icon-text  #{w.name}
       span.icon.icon-info.icon-text.pull-right
         span.info  !{inf(w)}
.aa v1.0.2
`);

function render(){
  txt = tpl(windowManager)
  setContent(txt)
}
render();
window.ri=window.ri||0;
if(ri) clearInterval(ri);
ri = setInterval(render, 1000)
